variable.label: Play Quills in Random Order
variable.tooltip: If checked, each secessive press of quick button with play random quill sound, unchecked will play in order

variable.label: BEMF Change Time
variable.tooltip: Controls how fast the chuff volume can go from 0 to full volume based on changes in load when in Prototype Mode. (Default is 2.25 Seconds) .5mS per value – Range is from .5 mS to 16 sec.

variable.label: Forward Light Chuff BEMF Calibration
variable.tooltip: Early V4 decoder this is BEMF Low Calibration

variable.label: Forward Loaded Chuff BEMF Calibration
variable.tooltip: Early V4 decoder this is BEMF High Calibration

variable.label: Chuff Volume Velocity Adjustment
variable.tooltip: controls the effects accelerating and decelerating have upon the chuff volume. The higher the value the more drastic the change in volume from accelerating and decelerating

variable.label: Reverse Light Chuff BEMF Calibration
variable.tooltip: Early V4 decoder this is Chuff Volume Forward Trim

variable.label: Reverse Loaded Chuff BEMF Calibration
variable.tooltip: Early V4 decoder this is Chuff Volume Reverse Trim

variable.label: Rod Clank Volume Adjustments from BEMF
Rod Clank Volume Adjustments from Velocity
variable.tooltip: controls how much of an effect decelerating has on the volume of the rod clank. The higher the value the greater the volume increases in rod clank from decelerating

variable.label: Rod Clank Cutout Speed Low
variable.tooltip: controls at what speed the Rod Clank will play. At speeds below the value the Rod Knock will not play

variable.label: Rod Clank Cutout Speed High
variable.tooltip: controls at what speed the Rod Clank will play. At speeds above the value the Rod Knock will not play

variable.label: Smoke unit on time
variable.tooltip: Controls how long the fan pulse is for the smoke unit

variable.label: Aux Input Loop Timer
variable.tooltip: Controls how long a loop sound is allowed to play when triggered by the aux input (reed switch input) a value of 42 gives about a 3 second loop time
The value loaded into CV3 when switch mode is enabled
The value loaded into CV4 when switch mode is enabled
The value loaded into CV3 when main line mode is enabled
The value loaded into CV4 when main line mode is enabled

factReset.label: Entire decoder (except address and speed table)
Quick Lighting Preset: Standard Ditch Lights
